author: John Johnson
title: World's Top Golfer Laments 'Stupid' Ravioli Injury
text:
Scottie Scheffler gashed his hand making ravioli and needed surgery After sitting out the first two tournaments of the year, the top-ranked golfer in the world will compete for the first time in 2025 in the Pebble Beach Pro-Am this week. Why the delay for Scottie Scheffler? He badly cut his hand making ravioli on Christmas Day and needed surgery, reports the Athletic . Scheffler, detailing the incident for the first time, says he was making the dish by hand and using an empty wine glass to…
John Johnson

author: Staff Writer
title: Indian town abuzz as divisive temple nears completion
text:
In an Indian town known as a flashpoint for sectarian violence, workers are crafting the final touches on a divisive temple that has come to symbolise the country's rising tide of Hindu nationalism.
Prime Minister Narendra Modi will next month inaugurate Ayodhya's new shrine to Lord Ram on a site where a mosque once stood, before it was torn down by Hindu zealots more than three decades ago.
Muslim residents of the city, remembering the deadly riots that accompanied the demolition, have been wary of its renewed atmosphere of religious fervour.
But for many more, the project is both a means of restoring Ayodhya to the glory of its depiction in ancient Hindu texts, and proof of Modi's commitment to defending India's majority faith just months ahead of national elections.
"Modi has stayed true to his promise," housewife Gudiya Devi told AFP outside another temple in Ayodhya after her morning prayers.
"All these years we dreamt of a majestic Ram temple and now that dream is coming true," she added. "This is all thanks to Modi. He is our true leader."
Artisans were toiling on top of bamboo scaffolds Friday to finish ornamental details on the main structure of the imposing shrine, which will stand 50 metres (160 feet) tall at its highest point.
With a price tag of an estimated 20 billion rupees ($240 million) according to project manager Jagdish Aphale, its builders expect tens of millions of Hindu pilgrims to visit the temple each year.
Immense sums from government coffers have poured into Ayodhya to give the city's dilapidated infrastructure a facelift ahead of the inauguration.
A new international airport will open on Saturday, road and rail connections have been upgraded and a crop of new hotels have sprung up almost overnight.
Sidewalks and pillars have been decorated with the saffron flags and marigold flowers used in Hindu festivities to welcome travellers.
"So many pilgrims have already started pouring into the city," said Shubh Mangal, a 52-year-old who makes his living selling flowers and other offerings for Hindu worshippers.
"My profits have doubled. We are all overjoyed."
- 'Full of dread' -
Ram is one of the most revered deities in the Hindu pantheon as the protagonist of the Ramayana, one of the faith's two foundational epics, which chronicles his battles with the demon-king Ravana.
Devout Hindus believe that Ram was born in Ayodhya around 7,000 years ago but that during the rule of the Mughal Empire, the Babri Masjid mosque was built on top of his birthplace in the 16th century.
Modi's presence at the inauguration is effectively the opening salvo in his campaign for re-election later in 2024.
His Bharatiya Janata Party (BJP) has campaigned for decades to build a temple on the site and its activists were instrumental in the mosque's demolition.
One senior BJP leader travelled around the country to rally the faithful to the cause in a Toyota sedan fitted to resemble Ram's mythical chariot -- a procession that sparked multiple religious riots in its wake.
The mosque was torn down by a mob in 1992, triggering another wave of riots across the country that killed 2,000 people, mostly Muslims.
Its destruction was a hammer blow to the foundations of India's secular political order, paving the way for the rise of Hindu nationalism to become the country's dominant political force.
The site lay dormant for decades before a Supreme Court decision in 2019 permitted construction of the Ram temple.
Haji Mehboob, a witness for the losing side of that case, said Modi's presence at the temple's inauguration was another milestone in the increasing entanglement of Hindu worship and politics.
"The prime minister of a secular country is coming to inaugurate a Hindu temple... with an eye on winning the 2024 elections by reaching out to his Hindu base," he told AFP.
"The Muslim community in Ayodhya is full of dread over what the future holds for them."

title: Affordable gaming PC has price axed in generous Amazon deal
text:
MSI GF63 15.6″ 144 Hz Gaming Laptop
Affordable gaming PC has price axed in generous Amazon deal
This gaming laptop's price has just dropped on Amazon.
WePC is reader-supported. When you buy through links on our site, we may earn an affiliate commission. Prices subject to change.

If you’ve been on the endless quest for an affordable
gaming laptop that doesn’t compromise on performance, today might just be your lucky break. Amazon is currently offering a whopping discount of over $350 on the sleek MSI GF63 15.6″ 144 Hz Gaming Laptop. This laptop ensures solid mainstream gaming capabilities, delivering smooth visuals, decent FPS, and quicker load times for your favorite titles.
With its regular price of $999.00, the current price tag of $639.00 means you’re pocketing a substantial $360 in savings.
What do we like about this gaming laptop deal?
- Display: Fast pacing looks smooth on the 15.6-inch screen while providing vivid 45% NTSC color gamut coverage.
- Processor: An 11th generation Intel Core i5 CPU provides fast processing speed for efficient multitasking.
- Graphics: The Nvidia GeForce RTX 3050 GPU with 4GB of GDDR6 memory handles modern games with playable frame rates.
- Memory: 16GB DDR4 3200MHz memory keeps open apps and files readily accessible for efficient content creation or gaming.
- Storage: There is a 512GB NVMe solid-state drive for quick loading and additional storage capacity.
- Size: Measuring just 0.85 inches thin, its lighter-weight design makes on-the-go gaming more convenient.
Should you invest in this gaming laptop deal?
This MSI gaming laptop delivers smooth, fragging power at a reasonable price. The discount of $360 is not something you get every day, especially since the year just started. The 144Hz Full HD display lets matches and graphics show fluidly with an 11th Gen Intel Core i5 CPU and RTX 3050 GPU competent enough for eSports titles. 16 gigs of RAM lets you game and multitask without slowdown, while the NVMe SSD loads Windows and games speedily. And at under an inch thin, its lighter design makes blasting foes on the go actually portable. Sure, the hardware won’t break performance records, but for playing the trendiest competitive games at decent frame rates no matter where you are, it brings some nice spec perks without the higher cost.

author: Lucas Barbosa
title: No clima do Jogo das Estrelas, exposição sobre basquete é inaugurada em BH
text:
A exposição Fundamentos do Basquete foi inaugurada nesta quarta-feira (19), no Minas Tênis Clube, na Rua da Bahia, em Belo Horizonte. Autoridades, dirigentes e jogadores estiveram presentes na cerimônia que abre o Jogo das Estrelas.
Parte do evento, a exposição é aberta ao público, gratuita e será exibida pelos próximos 15 dias.
Exposição Fundamentos do Basquete
Com curadoria de Gustavinho Lima, que é ex-jogador, a exposição apresenta fotos históricas do basquete brasileiro, estatísticas, peças raras, como camisas, tênis, bolas, troféus e, para fazer jus ao nome, explica os fundamentos da modalidade.
“É uma visão mais poética sobre o basquete. Os jogadores que cravaram seus nomes na história a partir da plasticidade de seus fundamentos”, explicou o curador à Itatiaia.
Minas Tênis Clube vê evento como ‘festa de aniversário’
Um dos mais tradicionais clubes poliesportivos do Brasil, o Minas Tênis Clube celebra 90 anos em 2025.
O presidente Carlos Henrique Martins destacou que o Jogo das Estrelas é parte da comemoração do aniversário do clube. O dirigente se mostrou honrado em ver a instituição da Rua da Bahia receber o evento pela segunda vez.
“Essa é uma edição especial, porque faz parte da comemoração dos 90 anos do Minas. Esse ano todo são diversos eventos, que nós já convidamos toda a sociedade de Belo Horizonte, para curtir com os minastenistas”, celebrou Carlos à Itatiaia.
Jogo das Estrelas
Nos dias 21 e 22 de março, Belo Horizonte se tornará a capital do basquete brasileiro.
A Arena UniBh, na Rua da Bahia, no Lourdes, receberá o Jogo das Estrelas, evento que reunirá alguns dos principais nomes da modalidade no país, com partidas e desafios especiais.
A Itatiaia transmitirá, com imagens, ao vivo e em 4k no YouTube, os dois dias de evento.

author: @FanDuelResearch
title: 3 Best NBA Bets and Player Props for Rockets at Kings
text:
NBA
3 Best NBA Bets and Player Props for Rockets at Kings
Even within a single NBA game, betting markets are abundant.
You can bet traditional markets like the spread or the total, but we've also got tons of player-prop markets to sift through.
Which bets stand out today as the Houston Rockets face the Sacramento Kings?
Let's dig into the best bets in FanDuel Sportsbook's NBA betting odds, utilizing FanDuel Research's NBA projections to try to find value.
Rockets at Kings Betting Picks
Rockets Moneyline (+152)
I'm not one to advocate for a team that will be playing their second road game in as many days, but I'm also not one to pass up the opportunity to back the Houston Rockets (27-12) at +152 odds against a lesser Sacramento Kings (20-20) team.
Houston comes in with a +6.2 net rating while Sacramento owns a +2.6 net rating. The Rockets actually have a better net rating on the road (+6.7) and tout a 13-6 record in that split. The Kings, meanwhile, have gone a rough 10-12 at home.
The Rockets check in with the third-best defensive rating in the league. The Kings have gone 4-7 against the top 9 defenses and struggle with a -30 point differential in this split.
Moneyline
This young Houston group has gone an iffy 3-4 on the second leg of a back-to-back this season, but all of those drops were lost by six points or fewer and they own a +24 point differential in this split. I should note that three of those four losses came against strong and healthy competition, including the Minnesota Timberwolves, Milwaukee Bucks, and San Antonio Spurs.
Sacramento ranks 14th in defensive rating and 18th at home. The Rockets have gone a convincing 19-4 against teams that fare outside the top 11 on defense, including 8-1 on the road.
Simply put, I don't think Houston should have just a 39.7% win chance (via +152 odds) against a non-powerhouse.
Jalen Green Under 23.5 Points (-106)
Jalen Green is on a heater of all heaters. He's averaging 32 points across his last six games and has gone a breathtaking 32-for-64 (50.0% 3P%) from distance in that span.
I'm calling an end to that hot streak, and I don't think that takes away too much from betting Houston outright.
On the season, Green is averaging 21.3 points per game and has scored under 23.5 points at a 64.1% clip, up from the 51.5% probability on these -106 odds.
Most telling is his output against fast-paced teams. The Kings operate at the 13th-quickest pace in the league and rank seventh in pace this month. Green, meanwhile, has scored under 23.5 points in a mammoth 80.0% of games (16 out of 20) versus top 15 pace clubs, whereas he averages 23.4 points outside this split.
Jalen Green - Points
While it's intimidating to bet against Green given his recent play, the 64.1% hit rate on the under and the 80.0% hit rate in that relevant pace split are hard to deny.
Plus, the Rockets have gone 17-8 in games where Green scored under 23.5 points, so the correlation between these two bets is weak enough for me to feel ok betting against Green while betting on Houston.
Keegan Murray Over 10.5 Points (-125)
Keegan Murray has cleared this prop in five straight games and could continue that trend tonight.
On the season, Murray is averaging 11.9 points. He's scored 10 points in 70.3% of games and has cracked over 10.5 points at a 59.5% rate, up from the 55.5% implied probability on these -125 odds.
As mentioned, the Rockets come in with the third-best defense in the league. Great opposing defenses have historically led to increased opportunities for the at times forgotten about Murray.
Murray is averaging 12.1 points and has cleared 10.5 points in 66.7% of games versus top 12 defenses. He's eclipsed this prop at a 70.0% rate (7 out of 10 contests) against the top 9 defenses. That includes one 13-point outing against Houston earlier this season.
Keegan Murray - Points
Our NBA DFS projections expect Murray to score 13.8 points in this matchup. His defensive qualities (leads the team in defensive win shares) should keep him on the court down the stretch. Notably, Murray has been playing 38.3 minutes (third-most) across his last four, evidently winning favor with new interim head coach Doug Christie.

author: Grupo Megamedia
title: Clima en Yucatán: Se esperan lluvias debido a onda tropical; el calor seguirá “reinando”
text:
YUCATÁN.— El Centro Hidrometeorológico Regional “Mérida” , del Servicio Meteorológico Nacional (SMN), dio a conocer su informe sobre el pronóstico meteorológico, válido de las 06:00 horas del viernes 2 a las 06:00 horas del sábado 3 de agosto de 2024.
Indicando que, se prevé cielo parcialmente nublado a nublado, con probabilidad de tormentas fuertes, así como chubascos con tormenta. Ambiente caluroso a muy caluroso en el día.
Y para las próximas 24 horas se prevé que debido al establecimiento de un canal de baja presión, en combinación con el calentamiento diurno e inestabilidad en la tropósfera alta, se presenten condiciones de cielo medio nublado a nublado , con probabilidad de tormentas fuertes principalmente en el oriente y sur de Yucatán , en el resto de la región se esperan chubascos con tormentas dispersas.
Ambiente caluroso a muy caluroso durante el día y cálido en la noche. Vientos del noreste de 15 a 25 km/h con rachas mayores a 40 km/h en zonas costeras.
Clima en Mérida El pronóstico de temperaturas para la ciudad de Mérida es en el rango de 35 a 37° C como máxima y de 24 a 26° C la mínima. Para el interior del estado, la máxima será de 36 a 38 °C en el sur y oriente y mínima de 23 a 25° C.
Temperatura actual de Mérida A las 8:00 de la mañana de este viernes, la temperatura en Mérida fue de 28° Celsius, con humedad del 83% y vientos de 5 km/h.
A través de su cuenta en la red social “X”, antes Twitter, el meteorólogo Juan Antonio Palma Solís , coordinador de la agencia de meteorología Meteored México , informó que, la interacción de la “Vaguada Maya” con una onda tropical sobre el mar Caribe occidental provocará lluvias y tormentas en la península de Yucatán y Tabasco durante el transcurso de este viernes.
Lee también:
– Temporada de lluvias en Yucatán, ¿cuándo inicia y cuándo termina?
– ¿Cuál es la diferencia entre un ciclón tropical y un huracán?
– ¿Por qué los huracanes tienen nombre?
– Temporada de huracanes 2023 en el Atlántico: Fecha de inicio y nombres de tormentas
– Temporada de huracanes: ¿qué significan los colores en las alertas y las categorías?
Clima CDMX El Servicio Meteorológico Nacional (SMN), en su pronóstico general, prevé para el Valle de México: Por la mañana, cielo medio nublado y ambiente fresco, siendo frío en zonas altas del Estado de México. Bancos de niebla al amanecer en zonas altas. Por la tarde, ambiente templado, siendo cálido en el suroeste del Estado de México. Cielo nublado con lluvias puntuales fuertes en la Ciudad de México y en el Estado de México, acompañadas de descargas eléctricas y posible caída de granizo. las cuales podrían ocasionar incremento en los niveles de ríos y arroyos, deslaves, encharcamientos e inundaciones, principalmente en vialidades . Viento del noreste de 10 a 25 km/h en la región, con rachas de 40 a 60 km/h en zonas de tormenta. La temperatura mínima pronosticada para la Ciudad de México es de 12 a 14 °C y la máxima de 23 a 25 °C. Para Toluca, Edo. Méx., se prevé una temperatura mínima de 9 a 11 °C y máxima de 20 a 22 °C.
¿Cómo estará el clima? El SMN, en su pronóstico por regiones, anticipa para el Golfo de México: Cielo nublado con lluvias aisladas durante la mañana en el sur de Veracruz, y cielo con nubes dispersas en el resto de la región. Ambiente matutino templado, y fresco con bancos de nieblas en zonas altas. Por la tarde, cielo nublado con lluvias puntuales muy fuertes con descargas eléctricas en Veracruz y Tabasco; las cuales podrían reducir la visibilidad, ocasionar encharcamientos, inundaciones y deslaves, así como incrementar los niveles de ríos y arroyos. Asimismo, lluvias aisladas con posibles descargas eléctricas en zonas de Tamaulipas. Viento de componente este de 10 a 20 km/h en la región, con rachas de 40 a 60 km/h en zonas de Tamaulipas.
Mientras que para la Península de Yucatán pronostica: Cielo medio nublado y ambiente templado por la mañana. Por la tarde, ambiente cálido y cielo nublado con lluvias puntuales fuertes en Campeche y Quintana Roo, así como chubascos en Yucatán; todas con descargas eléctricas, las cuales podrían generar encharcamientos o inundaciones . Viento del norte y noreste de 10 a 20 km/h en la región, con rachas de 40 a 60 km/h en zonas de Campeche y Yucatán.
Te puede interesar: Clima en Yucatán: Continúa el calor, ¿la tormenta tropical Carlotta afectará a la Península?

author: @kwqcnews
title: Could a holiday pet have consequences? Officials urge caution
text:
Could a holiday pet have consequences? Officials urge caution
DAVENPORT, Iowa (KWQC) -Employees at animal shelters in the Quad Cities said they usually see an increase in animal adoptions around the holiday season.
“They need to consider that it is a life and there is a lot to consider in bringing a new life into your home,” QC Paws shelter supervisor Abby Isenberger said.
Before getting a pet, Isenberger said shelter workers ask families questions about financial and physical responsibility.
“We hope that we ask the right questions and can get these animals into a home that they can stay forever,” Isenberger said.
But after the holidays are over, workers say they’ve seen pets returned to the shelter.
“Couple months later people realize, you know, maybe, they’re not able to take care of the pet," Bryn Rea, an animal caretaker at King’s Harvest Pet Rescue said.
Financial Impact
The workers also said they’ve seen pets being returned to the shelter because people can’t afford to take care of them anymore.
“With everything, just the prices of everything going up, it’s been really difficult.” Rea said.
According to the
[U.S. Bureau of Labor Statistics](https:// With everything. Just the prices of everything going up, it's been really difficult.), the cost of pets, pet products and services in the U.S. has gone up for consumers in the last year.
